item.title: Using Git with multiple accounts on one system
item.description: Set correct E-Mail address based on directory Git supports conditional configurations, let’s take advantage of this. Assuming we have an account for Github and Azure, we create a directory for each provider where we clone the repositories. PS C:\Dev> New-Item -Name 'AzRepos' -Type Directory PS C:\Dev> New-Item -Name 'ghRepos' -Type Directory For each directory we need a configuration file. These files should be located near the git config file. On Windows the config file are located at the user dirctory.
